entry.title: Monday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Snow level 1200 metres lowering to valley bottom after midnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries or rain showers. High plus 4 with temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: A few rain showers and flurries changing to a few flurries late in the morning. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the afternoon. High plus 4 with temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 20 February 2023
